00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PreStreamG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017

00033 
00034  SUBROUTINE PreStreamG
00035 
00036 ! Common Variables
00037  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00038  USE Domain,    ONLY : ni, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00039  USE FluidParams
00040  USE LBMParams
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 ! Local Variables
00044  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js, ie2, iw2, jn2, js2
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Fs, UG, ux, uy, U_sq, v
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, tau, invtau, AX, rho3
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoU
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: geq, Gam, GamW
00049  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradRhoD
00050 
00051 
00052  DO j = ymin, ymax
00053    DO i = xmin, xmax
00054 
00055 ! Define some local values
00056      rhon = rho(i,j)
00057      ux   = u(i,j,1)
00058      uy   = u(i,j,2)
00059      U_sq = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00060      tau  = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00061      invtau  = 0.5D0/tau
00062      rho3 = 3.D0*rho(i,j)
00063 
00064 ! Identify first neighbors 
00065      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00066      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00067      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00068      js = ni(i,j,4)
00069 
00070 ! Identify second neighbors
00071      ie2 = ni(ie,j,1)
00072      jn2 = ni(i,jn,2)
00073      iw2 = ni(iw,j,3)
00074      js2 = ni(i,js,4)
00075 
00076 !--------- Directional derivatives ( Second Order Mixed differencing scheme ) --
00077 ! Gradient of the density rho
00078      AX = rho(ie2,j) - rho(i,j)
00079      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( - rho(ie2,j  ) + 4.D0*rho(ie,j ) - rho3 )
00080      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(1) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,j) - rho(iw,j) )
00081 
00082      AX = rho(i,jn2) - rho(i,j)
00083      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( - rho(i  ,jn2) + 4.D0*rho(i ,jn) - rho3 )
00084      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(2) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,jn) - rho(i,js) )
00085 
00086      AX = rho(iw2,j) - rho(i,j)
00087      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( - rho(iw2,j  ) + 4.D0*rho(iw,j ) - rho3 )
00088      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(3) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,j) - rho(ie,j) )
00089 
00090      AX = rho(i,js2) - rho(i,j)
00091      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( - rho(i  ,js2) + 4.D0*rho(i ,js) - rho3 )
00092      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(4) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,js) - rho(i,jn) )
00093 
00094      AX = rho(ie2,jn2) - rho(i,j)
00095      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( - rho(ie2,jn2) + 4.D0*rho(ie,jn) - rho3 )
00096      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(5) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,jn) - rho(iw,js) )
00097 
00098      AX = rho(iw2,jn2) - rho(i,j)
00099      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( - rho(iw2,jn2) + 4.D0*rho(iw,jn) - rho3 )
00100      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(6) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )
00101 
00102      AX = rho(iw2,js2) - rho(i,j)
00103      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( - rho(iw2,js2) + 4.D0*rho(iw,js) - rho3 )
00104      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(7) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,js) - rho(ie,jn) )
00105 
00106      AX = rho(ie2,js2) - rho(i,j)
00107      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( - rho(ie2,js2) + 4.D0*rho(ie,js) - rho3 )   
00108      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(8) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )
00109 
00110 !-------- Equilibrium values of Gamma and the distribution function g ----------
00111 ! This definition of Gamma (Gam) is different from Lee-Lin because we embed the
00112 ! product by invCs_sq (needed in the collision term) in the definition itself
00113      GamW(0) = W0C*U_sq
00114      Gam(0)  = invCs_sq*( W0 - GamW(0) )
00115      geq(0)  = W0C*p(i,j) - rhon*GamW(0)
00116 
00117      GamW(1) = W1C*( ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00118      Gam(1)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(1) )
00119      geq(1)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(1)
00120 
00121      GamW(2) = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00122      Gam(2)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(2) )
00123      geq(2)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(2)
00124 
00125      GamW(3) = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00126      Gam(3)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(3) )
00127      geq(3)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(3)
00128 
00129      GamW(4) = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00130      Gam(4)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(4) )
00131      geq(4)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(4)
00132 
00133      v       = ux + uy
00134      GamW(5) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00135      Gam(5)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(5) )
00136      geq(5)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(5)
00137 
00138      v       = -ux + uy
00139      GamW(6) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00140      Gam(6)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(6) )
00141      geq(6)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(6)
00142 
00143      v       = -ux - uy
00144      GamW(7) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00145      Gam(7)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(7) )
00146      geq(7)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(7)
00147 
00148      v        = ux - uy
00149      GamW(8) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00150      Gam(8)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(8) )
00151      geq(8)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(8)
00152 
00153 ! Directional terms common to all g components
00154      gradRhoU = ux*gradRhoX(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY(i,j)
00155      UG       = ux*GX(i,j)       + uy*GY(i,j)
00156 
00157 !--------- Collision and stream for the distribution function g ----------------
00158 ! Direction 0
00159      Fs = GamW(0)*gradRhoU + Gam(0)*UG
00160      gbar(i ,j ,0) = g(i,j,0) + invTau*( geq(0) - g(i,j,0) ) - 0.5D0*Fs
00161 
00162 ! Direction 1
00163      Fs = GamW(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(1)*( GX(i,j) - UG )
00164      gbar(ie,j ,1) = g(i,j,1) + invTau*( geq(1) - g(i,j,1) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00165 
00166 ! Direction 2
00167      Fs = GamW(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(2)*( GY(i,j) - UG )
00168      gbar(i ,jn,2) = g(i,j,2) + invTau*( geq(2) - g(i,j,2) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00169 
00170 ! Direction 3
00171      Fs = GamW(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(3)*( GX(i,j) + UG )
00172      gbar(iw,j ,3) = g(i,j,3) + invTau*( geq(3) - g(i,j,3) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00173 
00174 ! Direction 4
00175      Fs = GamW(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(4)*( GY(i,j) + UG )
00176      gbar(i ,js,4) = g(i,j,4) + invTau*( geq(4) - g(i,j,4) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00177 
00178 ! Direction 5
00179      Fs = GamW(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(5)*( GX(i,j) + GY(i,j) - UG )
00180      gbar(ie,jn,5) = g(i,j,5) + invTau*( geq(5) - g(i,j,5) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00181 
00182 ! Direction 6 
00183      Fs = GamW(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(6)*( GX(i,j) - GY(i,j) + UG )
00184      gbar(iw,jn,6) = g(i,j,6) + invTau*( geq(6) - g(i,j,6) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00185 
00186 ! Direction 7
00187      Fs = GamW(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(7)*( GX(i,j) + GY(i,j) + UG )
00188      gbar(iw,js,7) = g(i,j,7) + invTau*( geq(7) - g(i,j,7) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00189 
00190 ! Direction 8
00191      Fs = GamW(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(8)*( GX(i,j) - GY(i,j) - UG )
00192      gbar(ie,js,8) = g(i,j,8) + invTau*( geq(8) - g(i,j,8) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00193 
00194    END DO
00195  END DO
00196 
00197  RETURN
00198  END SUBROUTINE PreStreamG
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:02:43 2008 for LL-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
